data.content:
noun
chiefly Brit :the activity or process of thinking about a problem or situation in order to decide what to do [noncount]
It is time for some stocktaking. [=it's time to take stock of the situation] [singular]
It is time for a stocktaking.
[noncount] Brit :the act or process of making a complete list of the items or things that are in a place :inventory
